9b5c9372-391b-4590-aa5a-c225be1b6dbd.description: An certified individual in iManage Get to Work 10 on the Desktop has extensive knowledge in transitioning from iManage Classic Clients (FileSite and DeskSite) to iManage Work Desktop for Windows, including removal of Classic Clients and installation/configuration of iManage Work 10 on the Desktop. The certification also includes UAT, smoke testing, and Communication, Training and Change Planning. The certified individual also holds extensive knowledge and experience in iManage Work 10 as a user.
